Text:
Worst uploads ever...
Upload your screens at another place...

Are there more people having problem with the Bayimg links.... if not you have the problem " Kaptnobi "  Cheers  :-)  and i cant see you have uppload any thing to this site,so why complaining to people doing that...and you dont have to download any thing if you dont want it.....
Screens is working just fine. Thanks. But I wonder how old this Lady Sonia could be? Looks likie 45-50 at least!!
Screens working just fine, thanks for all your uploads. ;)

@Kaptnobi, you could show a little more respect, if you dont like what is uploaded dont download.

However on your thoughts about bayimg I tend to agree. I am still on win xp and get alot of popups and potential virus/trojan and shit from the bayimg links.. The links directly to the jpeg image though is completely safe, and Merzedes and I have discussed it and decided to try posting those instead when we have to up screens ourselves...

This link would then be:

http://image.bayimg.com/a91dc4161c398d49bc8f8d73ab8a57a5abda4f50.jpg
screens work fine and load fast.... Thanks
